remarks: The composition of two faithful functors is faithful.  Proposition 3.30(c) in [Adamek] p. 35.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Jan-2017.)
statement:
cofth.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. ( C Faith D ) ) $.
cofth.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. ( D Faith E ) ) $.
cofth $p |- ( ph -> ( G o.func F ) e. ( C Faith E ) ) $.
